name: Based Pixel Hero
description:
Based Pixel Hero is simple turn-based strategy. Explore world by winning battles. 

Make the most of your action points each turn, read your enemies next moves. 

During battle you can use next actions, some of which require action points:

1. Wait - just skip your turn 

2. Look - in look mode select tile on the board to get additional info. Can be helpful to getting info about enemies

3. Walk - choose tile where you would like to walk, the amount of action points required for this action is path length

4. Attack - can be used only for enemies in specific range. Consumes 3 action points

The battle system is inspired by Fallout (1, 2).
